analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas gsang ste ston pa'i dge slong las gzhung las 'byung ba'i sngags kyis spro 'am zhes spro bar bya'o //
translated: Then the monk officiant should ask the candidate, by means of the formula given in the scriptures, whether he is willing to undergo the secret trial.

original: de'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pa nges kyang gal te bdag nyid spro na spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pa nges kyang gal te bdag nyid spro na spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If the candidate is willing, he should say so.

original: de dang de ltar byas nas de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas gsang ste ston pa de dge 'dun las gsol ba bya ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o //
analyzed: de dang de ltar byas nas de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas gsang ste ston pa de dge 'dun las gsol ba bya ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o //
translated: After that, the monk officiant should perform the proclamation to the Saṅgha by means of the single proclamation formula, in order to request the Saṅgha to grant the candidate the secret trial.

original: gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las zhes bya ba ni las brgya rtsa gcig ni las gsum gyis bsdus te /
analyzed: gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las zhes bya ba ni las brgya rtsa gcig ni las gsum gyis bsdus te /
translated: The single proclamation formula is one of three types of formulas used in the one hundred and one types of karmas.

original: gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las dang / gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so zhes gsungs pa las /
analyzed: gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las dang / gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so zhes gsungs pa las /
translated: The other two are the two proclamation formula and the four proclamation formula.

original: gang la las brjod pa med cing dge 'dun la go bar bya ba 'ba' zhig yod pa de ni gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang la las brjod pa med cing dge 'dun la go bar bya ba 'ba' zhig yod pa de ni gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is done by a single announcement to the Saṅgha is called “a transaction by a single announcement.”

original: 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni las ni 'dug pa nyid kyis bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni las ni 'dug pa nyid kyis bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te /
translated: “Sitting” means that the transaction is done by sitting, as it is said.

original: gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las thams cad ni 'dug pa nyid kyis bya'o //
analyzed: gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las thams cad ni 'dug pa nyid kyis bya'o //
translated: All transactions by a single announcement, by a single announcement and a single motion, and by a single announcement and three motions are done by sitting.

original: spyod lam bzhis mi bya bas de'i phyir 'dug la zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: spyod lam bzhis mi bya bas de'i phyir 'dug la zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: They are not done by the four modes of deportment. Therefore, “sitting” is stated.

original: las gzhan gyi skabs thams cad du yang las ni 'dug pa nyid kyi bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: las gzhan gyi skabs thams cad du yang las ni 'dug pa nyid kyi bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: In all the contexts of other transactions, the transaction is to be understood as done by sitting.

original: dge 'dun la gsol ba'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de lkog tu rjes su bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun la gsol ba'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de lkog tu rjes su bstan par bya ste /
translated: After the announcement to the Saṅgha, the one who is to be fully ordained by the secret should be instructed in private.

original: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pa'i dge slong gis dkyil 'khor pa'i phyi rol du song ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pa'i dge slong gis dkyil 'khor pa'i phyi rol du song ste /
translated: Therefore, after that, the monk who is the instructor should go outside the circle of the Saṅgha.

original: rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de dag la phyag 'tshal du bcug nas mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug tu bcug ste thal mo sbyor du bcug nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de dag la phyag 'tshal du bcug nas mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug tu bcug ste thal mo sbyor du bcug nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Having caused them to bow down to those who are to be fully approached, having caused them to sit down in front of them, having caused them to join their palms, he should say this, and so on.

original: bden pa'i dus zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i dus te /
analyzed: bden pa'i dus zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i dus te /
translated: The time of truth is the time of truth.

original: da bden par smros shig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: da bden par smros shig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Now speak the truth. This is the meaning.

original: byung ba'i dus zhes bya ba ni byung ba'i mtha'i gang yin pa de dag @249b smra ba'i dus yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: byung ba'i dus zhes bya ba ni byung ba'i mtha'i gang yin pa de dag @249b smra ba'i dus yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The time of occurrence is the time of occurrence. That which is the end of occurrence is the time of speaking. This is the meaning.

original: ma 'dzem par byos la zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs par gyos la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma 'dzem par byos la zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs par gyos la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Do not hesitate means do not be afraid.

original: smos shig ces bya ba ni khas long shig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: smos shig ces bya ba ni khas long shig ces bya ba'o //
translated: Speak means promise.

original: lan thob cig ces bya ba ni spongs shig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan thob cig ces bya ba ni spongs shig ces bya ba ste /
translated: Give an answer means abandon.

original: de ltar na yin pa la'ang yin zhes khas long shig ; ma yin pa la yang ma yin zhes spongs shig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar na yin pa la'ang yin zhes khas long shig ; ma yin pa la yang ma yin zhes spongs shig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: In that case, you should accept that what is is, and you should reject that what is not is!

original: khyod skyes pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mgo gcig pa'i tshul gyis dris pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: khyod skyes pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mgo gcig pa'i tshul gyis dris pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The question Are you born? and so on should be understood as a question in the manner of a single statement.

original: skyes pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dud pa'i tshul gyis lan gdab pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dud pa'i tshul gyis lan gdab pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The answer I am born! and so on should be understood as a reply in the manner of bowing.

original: bran zhes bya ba ni khyim nas skyes pa'o //
analyzed: bran zhes bya ba ni khyim nas skyes pa'o //
translated: A slave is one born into a household.

original: brkus pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rgyal srid las gya tshom du mthus bkug pa'o //
analyzed: brkus pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rgyal srid las gya tshom du mthus bkug pa'o //
translated: A captive is one who is forcibly brought from another kingdom by chance.

original: rnyed btson zhes bya ba ni gta'i tshul gyis byin pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed btson zhes bya ba ni gta'i tshul gyis byin pa'o //
translated: A hired worker is one who is given wages.

original: rtsod pa can zhes bya ba ni skyin po la sogs pa blangs nas phyis 'tsho ba ma lus pa na bran nyid du bsgos pa'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa can zhes bya ba ni skyin po la sogs pa blangs nas phyis 'tsho ba ma lus pa na bran nyid du bsgos pa'o //
translated: A debter is one who, after taking a loan and so on, later becomes a slave when unable to repay the debt.

original: btsongs pa zhes bya ba ni tshong gis thob pa'o //
analyzed: btsongs pa zhes bya ba ni tshong gis thob pa'o //
translated: A sold person is one obtained through trade.

original: rgyal pos bkrabs pa zhes bya ba ni blon po'i mchog gam rung ba'o //
analyzed: rgyal pos bkrabs pa zhes bya ba ni blon po'i mchog gam rung ba'o //
translated: “Appointed by the king” means the best or most suitable minister.

original: rgyal po la sdigs pa zhes bya ba ni dgra nyid gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po la sdigs pa zhes bya ba ni dgra nyid gnas pa'o //
translated: “Threatening the king” means remaining as an enemy.

original: rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed pa zhes bya ba ni rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir 'jug pa'o ;
analyzed: rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed pa zhes bya ba ni rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir 'jug pa'o ;
translated: “Engaging in actions that harm the king” means engaging in actions that harm the king.

original: byas sas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: byas sas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: “By oneself” means by one’s own self.

original: byed du bcug pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: byed du bcug pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: “By causing others” means by others.

original: chom rkun par grags pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten thams cad la chom rkun par grags pa ste rgyal mtshan btsugs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chom rkun par grags pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten thams cad la chom rkun par grags pa ste rgyal mtshan btsugs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Known as a bandit” means known as a bandit to the whole world, like one who has raised a flag.

original: za ma zhes bya ba ni rlig pa phyung ba'i nyes pas mthu nyams pa'am sa bon med pa'o //
analyzed: za ma zhes bya ba ni rlig pa phyung ba'i nyes pas mthu nyams pa'am sa bon med pa'o //
translated: “Eunuch” means one whose power is impaired by the fault of castration, or one who lacks semen.

original: ma ning zhes bya ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: ma ning zhes bya ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: “Neuter” is of five types:

original: skyes nas ma ning dang / zla ba phyed ba'i ma ning dang / 'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning dang / phrag dog can gyi ma ning dang / nyams pa'i ma ning ngo //
analyzed: skyes nas ma ning dang / zla ba phyed ba'i ma ning dang / 'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning dang / phrag dog can gyi ma ning dang / nyams pa'i ma ning ngo //
translated: The eunuch by birth, the eunuch for half a month, the eunuch who rises up, the eunuch through envy, and the eunuch through degeneration.

original: de la skyes pa'i ma ning zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i tshe nyid nas pho'i dbang po yod pa'i phyir bud med nyid kyang ma yin la /🔽mo'i dbang po yod pa'i phyir skyes pa nyid kyang ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de la skyes pa'i ma ning zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i tshe nyid nas pho'i dbang po yod pa'i phyir bud med nyid kyang ma yin la / mo'i dbang po yod pa'i phyir skyes pa nyid kyang ma yin pa ste /
translated: The eunuch by birth is neither a woman nor a man, because he lacks the organ of either sex.

original: 'jig rten na mtshan gnyis pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //🔽zla ba phyed pa'i ma ning zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni zhag bco lnga ni bud med kyi 'dod chags kyis gnod par @250a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten na mtshan gnyis pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o // zla ba phyed pa'i ma ning zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni zhag bco lnga ni bud med kyi 'dod chags kyis gnod par @250a * //
translated: He is called in the world “one with two organs.”

original: 'gyur la / zhag bco lnga ni skyes pa'i 'dod chags kyis gnod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur la / zhag bco lnga ni skyes pa'i 'dod chags kyis gnod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The eunuch for half a month is one who is tormented by the passions of a woman for half the month and by the passions of a man for the other half.

original: 'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning zhes ba ba ni skyes pa gzhan gyis brtsal ba na dbang po las su rung ba ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am bud med la sogs pas brtsal ba na dbang po las su rung ba ldang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning zhes ba ba ni skyes pa gzhan gyis brtsal ba na dbang po las su rung ba ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am bud med la sogs pas brtsal ba na dbang po las su rung ba ldang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The neuter who rises up embracing is one who rises up with a serviceable faculty when sought by another man, or one who rises up with a serviceable faculty when sought by a woman, and so on.

original: phrag dog can gyi ma ning zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis brtsal ba'i bud med la sogs pa mthong ba de'i tshe kho na phrag dog gis dbang po las su rung bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: phrag dog can gyi ma ning zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis brtsal ba'i bud med la sogs pa mthong ba de'i tshe kho na phrag dog gis dbang po las su rung bar 'gyur ba /
translated: The neuter who is jealous is one whose faculty becomes serviceable through jealousy at the very time of seeing a woman, and so on, sought by another.

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: At other times it does not become serviceable.

original: nyams pa'i ma ning zhes bya ba ni pho'i dbang po bcad pa la sogs pas nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa'i ma ning zhes bya ba ni pho'i dbang po bcad pa la sogs pas nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The neuter who is impaired is one whose faculty is impaired through castration and so on.

original: dge slong ma sun phyung zhes bya ba nyid ge slong ma pham par 'gyur ba ma byung ba la mi tshangs par spyad pas sun phyung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma sun phyung zhes bya ba nyid ge slong ma pham par 'gyur ba ma byung ba la mi tshangs par spyad pas sun phyung ba'o //
translated: The monk who causes a nun to commit an act of lust is one who causes a nun who has not been defeated to commit an act of lust through sexual intercourse.

original: rku thabs su gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i cho ga ma byas pa nyid dam ma chags pa nyid du shes la /
analyzed: rku thabs su gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i cho ga ma byas pa nyid dam ma chags pa nyid du shes la /
translated: One who lives by theft is one who knows that he has not completed the rite of full ordination or that he is not sexually potent.

original: lan gnyis su dge 'dun dang lhan cig las nyams su myong ba nyid gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lan gnyis su dge 'dun dang lhan cig las nyams su myong ba nyid gang yin pa'o //
translated: One who has twice fallen away is one who has experienced the loss of his status twice in relation to the Sangha.

original: tha dad du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gnas nas phyung ba'i las byas pa'am //
analyzed: tha dad du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gnas nas phyung ba'i las byas pa'am //
translated: One who lives separately is one who has been made to perform the act of suspension.

original: lhas sbyin lta bu chos ma yin pa la dmigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: lhas sbyin lta bu chos ma yin pa la dmigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One who is not a human being is one who is not a human being, such as Devadatta, or one who possesses the mind of an animal.

original: gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba ni nyams pa'o //
analyzed: gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba ni nyams pa'o //
translated: One who is not to be lived with is one who has fallen away.

original: mu stegs can zhes bya ba ni lta ba gzhan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mu stegs can zhes bya ba ni lta ba gzhan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One who is a heretic is one who possesses a different view.

original: mu stegs can zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can gang gis rab tu 'byung ba 'di yang dag par blangs la mu stegs can gyi lta ba dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: mu stegs can zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can gang gis rab tu 'byung ba 'di yang dag par blangs la mu stegs can gyi lta ba dang ldan zhing /
translated: One who has entered the heretic order is one who has gone forth in a heretic order, but who possesses the views of a heretic.

original: chos gos 'di bor te mu stegs can gyi rgyal mtshan des mu stegs can gyi gnas su skya rengs shar ba dang / mu stegs can gang gis rab tu 'byung ba 'di yang dag par blangs la mu stegs can gyi lta ba de dang ldan zhing lan gnyis su dge 'dun dang lhan cig las nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //🔽pha bsad pa zhes bya ba ni pha mi'i 'gro bar skyes pa bsad pa'o //
analyzed: chos gos 'di bor te mu stegs can gyi rgyal mtshan des mu stegs can gyi gnas su skya rengs shar ba dang / mu stegs can gang gis rab tu 'byung ba 'di yang dag par blangs la mu stegs can gyi lta ba de dang ldan zhing lan gnyis su dge 'dun dang lhan cig las nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o // pha bsad pa zhes bya ba ni pha mi'i 'gro bar skyes pa bsad pa'o //
translated: He is a tīrthika who has taken up the life of a renunciant, who possesses the views of the tīrthikas, and who has twice committed an action that causes loss of the training with the Saṅgha.🔽“Having killed one’s father” means having killed one’s father who is a human.

original: ma bsad pa zhes bya ba yang ma mi'i 'gro bar skyes pa bsad pa'o //
analyzed: ma bsad pa zhes bya ba yang ma mi'i 'gro bar skyes pa bsad pa'o //
translated: “Having killed one’s mother” means having killed one’s mother who is a human.

original: dgra bcom pa bsad pa zhes bya ba ni mi slob pa bsad pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa bsad pa zhes bya ba ni mi slob pa bsad pa'o //
translated: “Having killed an arhat” means having killed a non-trainee.

original: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa dang las dbye bar 'dod pas dge slong brgyad la sogs pa kha @250b gnyis su phye ba'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa dang las dbye bar 'dod pas dge slong brgyad la sogs pa kha @250b gnyis su phye ba'o //
translated: “Having caused a schism in the Saṅgha” means having caused a division in the Saṅgha with eight or more fully ordained monks, with the intention of causing a schism in the community of disciples.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsad pa'i bsam pa'i ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsad pa'i bsam pa'i ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba'o //
translated: Drawing blood with evil intent toward a Tathagata means drawing blood with an evil intent to kill a Tathagata.

original: sprul pa zhes bya ba ni klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa mi'i gzugs su 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pa zhes bya ba ni klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa mi'i gzugs su 'dug pa'o //
translated: An emanation is a being born in the animal realm such as a naga, etc. who has taken on the form of a human.

original: khyod la la la'i bu lon mang yang rung nyung yang rung cung zad chags pa med dam zhes bya ba ni bu lon ni gzhal bar bya ba yin pas de'i phyir bu lon can rab tu dbyung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyod la la la'i bu lon mang yang rung nyung yang rung cung zad chags pa med dam zhes bya ba ni bu lon ni gzhal bar bya ba yin pas de'i phyir bu lon can rab tu dbyung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i mi bya'o //
translated: You have no debts, large or small, to anyone? means that since debts are to be repaid, one who has a debt should not be given the going forth or higher ordination.

original: bu lon can thams cad rab tu dbyung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen par mi bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bu lon can thams cad rab tu dbyung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen par mi bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that one should not give the going forth or higher ordination to all who have debts.

original: 'di ltar gal te rdzogs par bsnyen nas 'jal nus so zhes zer na de rab tu byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te rdzogs par bsnyen nas 'jal nus so zhes zer na de rab tu byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen par bya'o //
translated: If one says, If you can repay it after receiving the higher ordination, then he should be given the going forth and higher ordination.

original: sngon rab tu byung ba ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyim pa las rab tu byung bar gsol ba dang / dge tshul las rdzogs par bsnyen par gsol ba de'i sngon rol na khyim par gyur pa de'i sngon rol du lan 'ga' rab tu byung ba ma yin zhes dri ba ste /🔽skyes pa ni lan bdun rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon rab tu byung ba ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyim pa las rab tu byung bar gsol ba dang / dge tshul las rdzogs par bsnyen par gsol ba de'i sngon rol na khyim par gyur pa de'i sngon rol du lan 'ga' rab tu byung ba ma yin zhes dri ba ste / skyes pa ni lan bdun rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Were you previously a monk? means Were you a householder before you requested ordination, and before you requested full ordination from a novice monk, were you ever ordained?🔽 Because it is permitted to go forth seven times, it is said, You have not committed any of the four defeats.

original: khyod pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung ba ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni sngon khyim pa'i mdun rol du rab tu 'byung ba de'i tshe na pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig ma byung🔽ngam zhes dri ba yin no /
analyzed: khyod pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung ba ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni sngon khyim pa'i mdun rol du rab tu 'byung ba de'i tshe na pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig ma byung ngam zhes dri ba yin no /
translated: Before you were a householder, when you went forth, you did not commit any of the four defeats.

original: gang yang rung ba gcig ces smos pa ni gcig gis kyang skye ba'i chos nyid med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba gcig ces smos pa ni gcig gis kyang skye ba'i chos nyid med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase any of the four means that even one of them prevents one from being reborn in the form realm.

original: 'babs pa na bslab pa legs par phul lam zhes bya ba ni sngon rab tu byung ba las bar du khyim par babs pa na dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa la sogs pa la bslab pa legs par phul ba'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'babs pa na bslab pa legs par phul lam zhes bya ba ni sngon rab tu byung ba las bar du khyim par babs pa na dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa la sogs pa la bslab pa legs par phul ba'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: When he descends, he should be asked, Have you properly relinquished your training? This means that if he had previously gone forth but in the meantime has become a householder, he should be asked if he has properly relinquished his training to a fully ordained monk or the like.

original: ji ltar khyod de ltar rab tu byung ba yin nam zhes bya ba ni khyod da ltar rdzogs par bsnyen par gsol ba'i 'di'i mdun du mkhan po las cho bzhin rab tu 'byung zhing slob dpon las dge tshul gyi sdom pa blangs pa yin nam zhes dri ba'o
analyzed: ji ltar khyod de ltar rab tu byung ba yin nam zhes bya ba ni khyod da ltar rdzogs par bsnyen par gsol ba'i 'di'i mdun du mkhan po las cho bzhin rab tu 'byung zhing slob dpon las dge tshul gyi sdom pa blangs pa yin nam zhes dri ba'o
translated: The question, How is it that you have gone forth like this? means, Have you received the full ordination from an abbot in the presence of this person who is now requesting full ordination, and have you received the novice precepts from a preceptor?

original: // tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni bslab pa dag go //
analyzed: // tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni bslab pa dag go //
translated: The phrase pure conduct refers to the precepts.

original: legs par spyad dam zhes bya ba ni legs par spyad par byas sam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: legs par spyad dam zhes bya ba ni legs par spyad par byas sam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The question, Have you practiced well? means, Have you practiced well?

original: don gyi slad du zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'i dbang gis so //🔽mdze @251a * //
analyzed: don gyi slad du zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'i dbang gis so // mdze @251a * //
translated: For the sake of the goal means for the sake of the purpose.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu rdol ba rnag khrag 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu rdol ba rnag khrag 'dzag pa'o //
translated: Leprosy means a disease in which the skin becomes covered with sores and pus oozes out.

original: 'bras zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu 'bru chen po dag yod pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu 'bru chen po dag yod pa'o //
translated: The word fruit means that there are large pustules.

original: phol mig ces bya ba ni 'brum bu 'bru phra mo dag yod pa'o //
analyzed: phol mig ces bya ba ni 'brum bu 'bru phra mo dag yod pa'o //
translated: The word pustule means that there are small pustules.

original: 'brum phran zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu phra mo dag yod pa de dag gi bar bar du yang rdol cing rma byung ba'o //🔽sha bkra zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad la khra khra bor yod pa ste /
analyzed: 'brum phran zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu phra mo dag yod pa de dag gi bar bar du yang rdol cing rma byung ba'o // sha bkra zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad la khra khra bor yod pa ste /
translated: The word small pustule means that there are small pustules, and between them there are openings and wounds.🔽The word vitiligo means that the whole body is variegated.

original: sha gzi gu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sha gzi gu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means a body with white spots.

original: khyi rdo zhes bya ba ni g-yan pa ste rnag 'dzag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyi rdo zhes bya ba ni g-yan pa ste rnag 'dzag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word dog's disease means that there is leprosy, because pus flows out.

original: g-ya' ba zhes bya ba ni g-yan pa'i rnam pa nyid de rnag mi 'dzag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: g-ya' ba zhes bya ba ni g-yan pa'i rnam pa nyid de rnag mi 'dzag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word itching means that there is a form of leprosy that does not cause pus to flow.

original: klog pa zhes bya ba ni g-ya' ba na klog pa ldang ba'o //
analyzed: klog pa zhes bya ba ni g-ya' ba na klog pa ldang ba'o //
translated: The word itching means that when there is itching, it arises.

original: rkang shu zhes bya ba ni med bal lo //🔽skem nad ces bya ba ni khong skem mo //
analyzed: rkang shu zhes bya ba ni med bal lo // skem nad ces bya ba ni khong skem mo //
translated: The word corns means that there are calluses.🔽The word consumption means that there is tuberculosis.

original: skom pa zhes bya ba ni skom nad do //
analyzed: skom pa zhes bya ba ni skom nad do //
translated: The word thirst means that there is diabetes.

original: brjed byed ces bya ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'khrugs pa las dran pa nyams pa'i bdag nyid kyi nad 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: brjed byed ces bya ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'khrugs pa las dran pa nyams pa'i bdag nyid kyi nad 'byung ba'am /
translated: The disease called “forgetting” is a sickness that arises from the disturbance of wind, bile, and phlegm, and is characterized by the loss of memory.

original: gdon gyis brlams pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o /
analyzed: gdon gyis brlams pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o /
translated: The forgetting is a disease of the mind which is a disturbance of wind, bile, and phlegm, or it is a transformation of being possessed by a demon.

original: bkres ngab ces bya ba ni bkres pa'i nad do //
analyzed: bkres ngab ces bya ba ni bkres pa'i nad do //
translated: Hunger is a disease of hunger.

original: skya rbab ces bya ba ni lus thams cad kyi pags pa'i mdog skya ba'o /
analyzed: skya rbab ces bya ba ni lus thams cad kyi pags pa'i mdog skya ba'o /
translated: Leucoderma is a discoloration of the skin of the whole body.

original: rkang bam zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i nad do //
analyzed: rkang bam zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i nad do //
translated: Elephantiasis is a disease of the feet.

original: mtshan bar rdol zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang gci ba gnyis lam gcig nas 'od ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan bar rdol zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang gci ba gnyis lam gcig nas 'od ba'o //
translated: Fissured anus is the passage of feces and urine through the same opening.

original: rims zhes bya ba ni spyi'i rang bzhin te nang du bag la zha ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rims zhes bya ba ni spyi'i rang bzhin te nang du bag la zha ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Fever is a general nature, because it is hidden inside.

original: rims drag po zhes bya ba ni rab tu gdung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rims drag po zhes bya ba ni rab tu gdung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: High fever is because of great torment.

original: rims nyin gcig pa zhes bya ba ni rims nyi ma gcig gis 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rims nyin gcig pa zhes bya ba ni rims nyi ma gcig gis 'byung ba'o //
translated: One-day fever is a fever that occurs every day.

original: nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni rims nyi ma gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dag gis 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni rims nyi ma gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dag gis 'byung ba'o //
translated: One-day, two-day, three-day, and four-day fevers occur due to one, two, three, or four days of the fever’s occurrence.

original: 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'khrug pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'khrug pa'o //
translated: “Confluence” means a disturbance of wind, bile, and phlegm.

original: rims nyin re ba zhes bya ba ni nyi ma re re la len re re 'debs pa dang / 'tsho ba gnyis byed pa'o //🔽rjes su bstan pa'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de la khyod ma pos par du ma 'ong bar sdod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o /
analyzed: rims nyin re ba zhes bya ba ni nyi ma re re la len re re 'debs pa dang / 'tsho ba gnyis byed pa'o // rjes su bstan pa'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de la khyod ma pos par du ma 'ong bar sdod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o /
translated: “Daily fever” means a fever that occurs every day and every other day.

original: // / bam po ba dun pa /
analyzed: // / bam po ba dun pa /
translated: After the instruction, the teacher should tell the student, who is to be fully admitted by the secret initiation, “Stay here until you are called.”

original: de ltar gsang ste bstan zhing bsgo nas dge 'dun la rdzogs par @251b bsnyen par bya ba de'i yongs su dag pa go bar bya ba dang / 'ong bzhu ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pa'i dge slong gis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste /🔽'dud pa dang bcas pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar gsang ste bstan zhing bsgo nas dge 'dun la rdzogs par @251b bsnyen par bya ba de'i yongs su dag pa go bar bya ba dang / 'ong bzhu ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu gsang ste ston pa'i dge slong gis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste / 'dud pa dang bcas pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The monk who instructs in secret should stand in the presence of the senior monks and, with respect, say this to the saṅgha in order to understand the purity of the one fully admitted and to request permission.

original: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun la gzhan gyi don du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas brjod par bya ste zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te
analyzed: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun la gzhan gyi don du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas brjod par bya ste zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te
translated: Standing in the presence of the senior monks and with respect means that what is said for the benefit of others to the saṅgha is said standing in the presence of the senior monks and with respect, because it is said, “Standing in the presence of the senior monks and with respect, say this to the saṅgha.”

original: / 'di lta ste zhu ba dag dang / 'dun pa yongs su dag pa dang / bgag dbye brjod pa dge 'dun gyi phyogs la bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye mdzad lags so zhes go bar bya ba dang / khrims su bya ba bzang po brjod pa dang /
analyzed: / 'di lta ste zhu ba dag dang / 'dun pa yongs su dag pa dang / bgag dbye brjod pa dge 'dun gyi phyogs la bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye mdzad lags so zhes go bar bya ba dang / khrims su bya ba bzang po brjod pa dang /
translated: the questions, the pure motivation, the announcement of the end of the rainy season retreat, the announcement of the end of the rainy season retreat by the saṅgha, the announcement of the good conduct,🔽the announcement of the number of voting tickets, and the announcement to the saṅgha of the improper use of bedding.

original: rtsod pa mi bskyed pa nyid dang / tshul shing gi grangs dang / gnas mal la log par longs spyod pa nyid dge 'dun la go bar bya ba dag ni rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa mi bskyed pa nyid dang / tshul shing gi grangs dang / gnas mal la log par longs spyod pa nyid dge 'dun la go bar bya ba dag ni rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas brjod par bya'o //
translated: These should be announced while standing at the end of the most senior monks, with bowed body.

original: gzhung kha cig las gsang ste ston pa ni lam gyi dbus nas 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas brjod par bya'o zhes kyang 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhung kha cig las gsang ste ston pa ni lam gyi dbus nas 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas brjod par bya'o zhes kyang 'byung ste /
translated: Some texts say that the announcement of the secret should be made while standing in the middle of the road, with bowed body.

original: de yang rung pa nyid yin par blta'o //
analyzed: de yang rung pa nyid yin par blta'o //
translated: That is also considered to be correct.

original: de bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi na zhes bya bas ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de'i yongs su dag par dge 'dun la go bar bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi na zhes bya bas ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de'i yongs su dag par dge 'dun la go bar bya ba bstan to //
translated: If he says, The things that are obstacles are completely pure, then the purity of that one who is to be fully ordained should be announced to the Saṅgha.

original: ci mchi zhig gam zhes bya bas ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de'i 'ong ba dge 'dun la zhu bar bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: ci mchi zhig gam zhes bya bas ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de'i 'ong ba dge 'dun la zhu bar bya ba bstan to //
translated: If he says, What is the obstacle? then the inquiry about the obstacle of that one who is to be fully ordained should be announced to the Saṅgha.

original: 'ong ba zhus pa'i 'og tu dge 'dun thams cad kyis yongs su dag na'o zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'ong ba zhus pa'i 'og tu dge 'dun thams cad kyis yongs su dag na'o zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: After the inquiry about the obstacle, it should be said, If the Saṅgha is ready, the Saṅgha should fully ordain so-and-so.

original: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni lan med pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni lan med pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word all is used to show that it is not a response.

original: gal te yongs su dag na'o zhes bya ba ni gal te rdzogs par bsnyen par bya bde bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag na'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni brjod ma thag pa'i de nyid la snyegs pa'i don de /
analyzed: gal te yongs su dag na'o zhes bya ba ni gal te rdzogs par bsnyen par bya bde bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag na'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni brjod ma thag pa'i de nyid la snyegs pa'i don de /
translated: If it is said, If the Saṅgha is ready, then if the things that are obstacles are completely pure for that one who is to be fully ordained. The word if is connected to just that which was just stated.

original: de kho na skad brjod par bya'i lhag ma ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni smra bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na skad brjod par bya'i lhag ma ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni smra bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the remainder.🔽The meaning of should be expressed is should be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be understood is should be known.🔽 The meaning of should be done is should be performed.

original: @252a * // dge 'dun la yongs su dag pa go bar bya ste /🔽'ong bar gnang ba de'i 'og tu de ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: @252a * // dge 'dun la yongs su dag pa go bar bya ste / 'ong bar gnang ba de'i 'og tu de ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: The meaning of should be said is should be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.

original: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de nyid dkyil 'khor bar bkug nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de nyid dkyil 'khor bar bkug nas /
translated: The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.

original: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal du bcug ste zhes bya ba gsungs so ;
analyzed: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal du bcug ste zhes bya ba gsungs so ;
translated: The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.

original: ; gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis gnang ste rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe na /🔽dge slong las byed pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: ; gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis gnang ste rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe na / dge slong las byed pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.🔽 The meaning of should be caused to be made is should be caused to be done.

original: de'i phyir dge slong las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen par gsol du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge slong las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen par gsol du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The meaning of should be caused to be said is should be caused to be spoken.

original: dge slong las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i dge slong la gsol du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dge slong las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i dge slong la gsol du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The monk who is the officiant should cause the one who is to be fully ordained to request full ordination from the fully ordained monks.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag drang bar gsol zhes bya ba ni phyag brkyang ba'i tshul gyis sam tshul khrims 'chal ba'i tshogs gcad pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag drang bar gsol zhes bya ba ni phyag brkyang ba'i tshul gyis sam tshul khrims 'chal ba'i tshogs gcad pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: The phrase “Venerable Saṅgha, please grant me refuge” means that he should extend his hands in the manner of supplicating or in order to cut off the accumulation of immorality.

original: ; bdag rjes su gzung du gsol zhes bya ba ni sngon sngom pa ma byin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ; bdag rjes su gzung du gsol zhes bya ba ni sngon sngom pa ma byin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “Please accept me” means that he has not previously taken the vows.

original: bdag la rjes su bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag la rjes su bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “Please teach me” means that he should be liberated from the suffering of cyclic existence.

original: gsol ba'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: gsol ba'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What should the monk who is the officiant do after the request?

original: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du bar chad dri ba'i gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du bar chad dri ba'i gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “After that, the monk who is the officiant should perform the procedure of the single announcement to ask about the obstacles in the midst of the Saṅgha.”

original: dge 'dun gyi nang du bdag nyid kyis rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de la bar chad dri ba'i phyir dge 'dun la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis go bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi nang du bdag nyid kyis rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de la bar chad dri ba'i phyir dge 'dun la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis go bar bya'o //
translated: In the midst of the Saṅgha, the person who is to be fully ordained should listen to the proclamation of the action of the single announcement, in order to ask about the obstructions.

original: nang du bar chad dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba 'di ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i gang zag gis thos par bya ste /
analyzed: nang du bar chad dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba 'di ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i gang zag gis thos par bya ste /
translated: This action of the single announcement, which is done in order to ask about the obstructions within, should be heard by the person who is to be fully ordained.

original: de ltar yang nang du dri ba'i phyir gsol ba la sogs pa ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya bas thos par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar yang nang du dri ba'i phyir gsol ba la sogs pa ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya bas thos par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the proclamation, etc., which is done in order to ask about the obstructions within, should be heard by the one who is to be fully ordained.

original: de nas las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis dge 'dun gyi nang du bar chad kyi chos rnams dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i las de dag ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i gang zag des thos pa dang bcas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis dge 'dun gyi nang du bar chad kyi chos rnams dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i las de dag ni rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba'i gang zag des thos pa dang bcas par bya'o //
translated: Then, the preceptor who is the officiant should do the action of the single announcement in order to ask about the dharmas that are obstructions within the Saṅgha, and the action of the single announcement and the four announcements in order to fully ordain. Those actions should be heard by the person who is to be fully ordained.

original: de las gzhan pa'i las ni @252b des thos par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i las ni @252b des thos par mi bya'o //
translated: The other actions are not to be done by him.

original: de ltar nang du bar chad dri ba'i gsol ba byas nas de'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar nang du bar chad dri ba'i gsol ba byas nas de'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Having thus requested the inquiry into the inner obstacles, what should be done next?

original: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du bar chad dri bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du bar chad dri bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that after that, the monk official should inquire into the obstacles in the midst of the Saṅgha.

original: ci gsang ste bstan pa dang / cho ga 'dra ba'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci gsang ste bstan pa dang / cho ga 'dra ba'am zhe na /
translated: Is it like the private instruction and the similar rite?

original: mi 'dra ste zhes de'i phyir 'di ltar dri bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: mi 'dra ste zhes de'i phyir 'di ltar dri bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is not similar. Therefore, it is said that it should be inquired like this, and so on.

original: rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa na gsang ste bstan pa dang / chos gos dang lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs pa de dag las gzhan pa'i las thams cad mdun du pha gu'i steng du rtsva bting pa la rting pa gnyis kyis mnan nas tsog tsog por 'dug tu bcug ste thal mo sbyor du bcug nas bya ba
analyzed: rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa na gsang ste bstan pa dang / chos gos dang lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs pa de dag las gzhan pa'i las thams cad mdun du pha gu'i steng du rtsva bting pa la rting pa gnyis kyis mnan nas tsog tsog por 'dug tu bcug ste thal mo sbyor du bcug nas bya ba
translated: When giving full ordination, except for the private instruction and the consecration of the Dharma robes and alms bowl, all other actions should be done in front, on a mat on the ground, with the two heels pressed down, sitting in a squatting position, with palms joined,

original: yin par gsungs so //
analyzed: yin par gsungs so //
translated: This is what is stated.

original: nang du bar chad dris pa'i 'og tu rdzogs par bsnyen par nye bar bsgrub par bya ba ste de'i phyir de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas gsol ba bya ste las bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: nang du bar chad dris pa'i 'og tu rdzogs par bsnyen par nye bar bsgrub par bya ba ste de'i phyir de'i 'og tu dge slong las byed pas gsol ba bya ste las bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: After the inner obstacles have been asked about, the full ordination should be accomplished. Therefore, after that, the monk officiant should make the announcement and perform the rite.

original: las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rdzogs par bsnyen par nye bar bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen par bya ba de gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rdzogs par bsnyen par nye bar bsgrub par bya /
translated: The one to be fully ordained should be fully ordained by the rite of proposal and fourfold proclamation.

original: yang dag par thob par bya /
analyzed: yang dag par thob par bya /
translated: He should be caused to obtain it correctly.

original: rab tu gnas par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rab tu gnas par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: He should be caused to be established in it. This is the meaning.

original: de'i 'og tu grib tshod gzhal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par bsnyen par nye bar bsgrub pa de'i 'og tu dge slong gang yang rung bas grib ma gzhal bar bya zhing grib ma de'i tshod rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i gang zag la da lta grib ma 'di
analyzed: de'i 'og tu grib tshod gzhal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par bsnyen par nye bar bsgrub pa de'i 'og tu dge slong gang yang rung bas grib ma gzhal bar bya zhing grib ma de'i tshod rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i gang zag la da lta grib ma 'di
translated: After that, the shadow should be measured. After that full ordination has been accomplished, any monk should measure the shadow. The shadow should be known to the person who is fully ordained.

original: tsam du gyur te zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tsam du gyur te zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: Now the shadow has become this much.

original: gzhal ba de yang ci zhig gis bya zhe na /
analyzed: gzhal ba de yang ci zhig gis bya zhe na /
translated: By what means is that shadow measured?

original: de'i phyir thur ma sor bzhi tsam gyis gzhal bar bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir thur ma sor bzhi tsam gyis gzhal bar bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “It is measured with a four finger width stick.”

original: grib ma gzhal ba de ni thur ma sor bzhi'i tshang tsam gyis gzhal na myur zhing sla bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: grib ma gzhal ba de ni thur ma sor bzhi'i tshang tsam gyis gzhal na myur zhing sla bar rig par bya'o //
translated: That shadow measurement is known to be quick and easy if measured with a four finger width stick.

original: rkang pa la sogs pas ni bul bar 'gyur gyis thur mas ni myur te /
analyzed: rkang pa la sogs pas ni bul bar 'gyur gyis thur mas ni myur te /
translated: If measured with the foot and so forth, it is slow. If measured with a stick, it is quick.

original: de'i phyir thur mas bcal na bzang gi gzhan gyis ni mi bzang ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir thur mas bcal na bzang gi gzhan gyis ni mi bzang ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is good if measured with a stick. It is not good if measured by other means.

original: grib tshong gzhal ba de ne dge slong gang yang rung ba gzhan gyis bya'i //
analyzed: grib tshong gzhal ba de ne dge slong gang yang rung ba gzhan gyis bya'i //
translated: That shadow measurement should be done by any other monk.

original: dge slong las byed pas mi bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong las byed pas mi bya ste /
translated: It should not be done by the monk who is the officiating monk.

original: 'di ltar des ni gnas brjod pa la sogs pa skabs lhag ma dag bya dgos pas stan las ldang bar mi rigs pa'i @253a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar des ni gnas brjod pa la sogs pa skabs lhag ma dag bya dgos pas stan las ldang bar mi rigs pa'i @253a * //
translated: Because it is not proper for him to rise from his seat, since he must do the remaining parts of the rite, such as describing the site.

original: phyir ro // ming ma grags pa gzhan gyi tha snyad bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyir ro // ming ma grags pa gzhan gyi tha snyad bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the convention of another who is not famous, it is said,

original: thur ma ji tsam yod pa de tsam la skyes bu zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: thur ma ji tsam yod pa de tsam la skyes bu zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The measure of the gnomon is the measure of the man.

original: thur ma de'i tha snyad ni skyes bu zhes bya ste /
analyzed: thur ma de'i tha snyad ni skyes bu zhes bya ste /
translated: The convention of the gnomon is called the man.

original: thur mas gzhal ba'i grib ma thur du byung ba re re la grib tshod skyes bu re re zhes bya /
analyzed: thur mas gzhal ba'i grib ma thur du byung ba re re la grib tshod skyes bu re re zhes bya /
translated: Each shadow of the gnomon that appears at noon is called a man.

original: sor re re zhing rtsa ba re re zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sor re re zhing rtsa ba re re zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Each fingerbreadth is called a root.

original: grib tshod 'ba' zhig gzhal bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: grib tshod 'ba' zhig gzhal bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Not only is the shadow to be measured,

original: gzhan yang de'i 'og tu nyin mtshan gyi cha brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i 'og tu nyin mtshan gyi cha brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la /
translated: but also the day and night are to be described.

original: nyin mtshan zhes bya ba ni nyin bar dang mtshan mo'o //
analyzed: nyin mtshan zhes bya ba ni nyin bar dang mtshan mo'o //
translated: Day and night are day and night.

original: de'i cha ni snga dro dang gung dang phyi dro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽snga dro grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di rnyed do zhe'am /
analyzed: de'i cha ni snga dro dang gung dang phyi dro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / snga dro grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di rnyed do zhe'am /
translated: Their parts are morning, noon, afternoon, and so on.🔽The shadow of the man and the root are found in the morning.

original: gung gi grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di rnyed do zhe'am /
analyzed: gung gi grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di rnyed do zhe'am /
translated: The shadow of the man and the root are found at noon.

original: phyi dro'i grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di rnyed do zhes brjod par bya ste /🔽snga dro dang gung tshigs kyi bar du ni grib tshod gang mang ba la snga la /🔽gung tshigs nas phyi dro'i bar du ni grib tshod gang nyung ba snga'o //
analyzed: phyi dro'i grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di rnyed do zhes brjod par bya ste / snga dro dang gung tshigs kyi bar du ni grib tshod gang mang ba la snga la / gung tshigs nas phyi dro'i bar du ni grib tshod gang nyung ba snga'o //
translated: The shadow is longer when the sun is low, and shorter when the sun is higher.🔽In the morning, the shadow is longer when the sun rises; in the evening, the shadow is longer when the sun sets.

original: skya rengs dang po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skya rengs dang po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The first watch of the night is the time of the first watch of the night.🔽The sun has risen four parts, when four of the twelve parts of the day have passed.

original: nyi ma brgyad cha shar ba zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi brgyad cha shar ba'o //🔽nyi ma bzhi cha shar ba zhes bya ba ni yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi bzhi cha shar ba'o //
analyzed: nyi ma brgyad cha shar ba zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi brgyad cha shar ba'o // nyi ma bzhi cha shar ba zhes bya ba ni yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi bzhi cha shar ba'o //
translated: The sun has risen eight parts, when eight of the twelve parts of the day have passed.

original: kha cig na re ma shar ba nas nub pa'i bar du lam ji srid yod pa'i brgyad cha dang bzhi cha shar ba'o zhes kyang zer ro //🔽gung tshigs ma yol ba zhes bya ba ni ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig na re ma shar ba nas nub pa'i bar du lam ji srid yod pa'i brgyad cha dang bzhi cha shar ba'o zhes kyang zer ro //🔽gung tshigs ma yol ba zhes bya ba ni ma 'das pa'o //
translated: According to others, the sun has risen four parts, when the sun has risen one fourth of the distance from the horizon to the nadir of the Meru of the continent; the sun has risen eight parts, when it has risen two fourths.🔽Before noon, when the sun is to the south, the shadow is longer when it is short; when the sun is to the north, the shadow is longer when it is long.

original: de'i 'og tu dus tshod brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni lo tshigs shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dus tshod brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni lo tshigs shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: This is for the purpose of knowing the year.

original: des na dus tshigs lnga po dag ni zla ba 'di'i tshes grangs 'di la nyin mo'i cha 'di'i grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di cam la zhe'am /
analyzed: des na dus tshigs lnga po dag ni zla ba 'di'i tshes grangs 'di la nyin mo'i cha 'di'i grib tshod skyes bu dang rtsa ba 'di cam la zhe'am /
translated: Therefore, the five seasons are to be stated: “On this date of this month, at this time of day, the shadow of the gnomon is this much long or short,

original: mtshan mo'i cha 'di tsam la khyod rdzogs par bsnyen to zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mtshan mo'i cha 'di tsam la khyod rdzogs par bsnyen to zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: or at this time of night, you have completed the retreat.”

original: 'o na dus tshod de dag du yod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na dus tshod de dag du yod ce na /
translated: How many times are there in a day?

original: de'i phyir dus tshod ni lnga ste zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus tshod ni lnga ste zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “There are five times.”

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: de'i phyir dgun gyi dus dang / dpyid kyi dus dang dbyar gyi dus dang / dbyar thung ngu'i dus dang / dbyar ring po'i dus so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dgun gyi dus dang / dpyid kyi dus dang dbyar gyi dus dang / dbyar thung ngu'i dus dang / dbyar ring po'i dus so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “The winter season, the spring season, the rainy season, the short rainy season, and the long rainy season.”

original: dgun gyi dngos po ni dgun gyi dus so //
analyzed: dgun gyi dngos po ni dgun gyi dus so //
translated: The state of winter is the winter season.

original: dpyid kyi dngos po ni dpyid kyi dus so //
analyzed: dpyid kyi dngos po ni dpyid kyi dus so //
translated: The state of spring is the spring season.

original: dbyar rnams kyi dngos po ni dbyar gyi dus so //
analyzed: dbyar rnams kyi dngos po ni dbyar gyi dus so //
translated: The season of summer is the summer time.

original: dus thung ngur gnas pa'i phyir shi ba dang 'dra bas @253b thung ngu yang de yin la dbyar kyang de yin pa ni dbyar thung ngu'i dus so //
analyzed: dus thung ngur gnas pa'i phyir shi ba dang 'dra bas @253b thung ngu yang de yin la dbyar kyang de yin pa ni dbyar thung ngu'i dus so //
translated: It is short because it lasts a short time, and it is like death.

original: dus ring ba'i phyir ring po yang de yin la dbyar kyang de yin pa ni dbyar ring ba'i dus so //
analyzed: dus ring ba'i phyir ring po yang de yin la dbyar kyang de yin pa ni dbyar ring ba'i dus so //
translated: It is long because it lasts a long time, and it is summer.

original: de dag gi tshad brjod par bya ba'i phyir /🔽de la dgun gyi dus ni zla ba bzhi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽ston zla tha chungs nya nas dpyid zla ra ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba bzhi ni dgun gyi dus so //
analyzed: de dag gi tshad brjod par bya ba'i phyir / de la dgun gyi dus ni zla ba bzhi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / ston zla tha chungs nya nas dpyid zla ra ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba bzhi ni dgun gyi dus so //
translated: In order to state the measure of these,🔽he says: The winter season is four months, etc.🔽The four months from the full moon of the last autumn month up to the full moon of the first spring month are the winter season.

original: dpyid kyi dus kyang zla ba bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni dpyid zla ra ba nya nas dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i bar gyi zla ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: dpyid kyi dus kyang zla ba bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni dpyid zla ra ba nya nas dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i bar gyi zla ba bzhi'o //
translated: The spring season is also four months. The four months from the full moon of the first spring month up to the full moon of the middle summer month are the spring season.

original: dbyar gyi dus ni zla ba gcig go zhes bya ba ni dbyar zla 'bring po nya nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig go //
analyzed: dbyar gyi dus ni zla ba gcig go zhes bya ba ni dbyar zla 'bring po nya nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig go //
translated: This is the one month from the full moon of the middle summer month up to the full moon of the last summer month.🔽One day is the short summer season.

original: dbyar thung ngu'i dus ni nyin zhag gcig go zhes bya ba ni dbyar zla tha chungs chos bcu drug gi nyin zhag gcig go //
analyzed: dbyar thung ngu'i dus ni nyin zhag gcig go zhes bya ba ni dbyar zla tha chungs chos bcu drug gi nyin zhag gcig go //
translated: This is one day of the last summer month, the sixteenth day of the waxing phase.🔽Three months are the long summer season, not completed in one day.

original: dbyar ring po'i dus ni nyin zhag gcig gis zla ba gsum du ma chog pa zhes bya ba ni dbyar thung ngu'i dus kyi nyin zhag gcig po de nyid kyis zla ba gsum du ma chog pa ste /
analyzed: dbyar ring po'i dus ni nyin zhag gcig gis zla ba gsum du ma chog pa zhes bya ba ni dbyar thung ngu'i dus kyi nyin zhag gcig po de nyid kyis zla ba gsum du ma chog pa ste /
translated: This is not completed in three months by the one day of the short summer season.

original: dbyar zla tha chungs tshes bcu bdun nas ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gnyis dang zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu'o //
analyzed: dbyar zla tha chungs tshes bcu bdun nas ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gnyis dang zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu'o //
translated: This is two months and twenty-nine days from the seventeenth day of the last summer month up to the full moon of the last autumn month.

original: dus tshod brjod pa de'i 'og tu gnas rnams brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i 'og tu las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa de la gnas rnams brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dus tshod brjod pa de'i 'og tu gnas rnams brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i 'og tu las byed pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa de la gnas rnams brjod par bya'o //
translated: The place should be stated to the one who has completed the novitiate by the one who is going to perform the rite after the novitiate.

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are those?

original: bzhi ste / phyag dar khrod pa dang / bsod snyoms pa dang / shing drung pa dang / bkus te bor ba zhes bya ba gnas bzhi po dag go //
analyzed: bzhi ste / phyag dar khrod pa dang / bsod snyoms pa dang / shing drung pa dang / bkus te bor ba zhes bya ba gnas bzhi po dag go //
translated: There are four: the refuse-rag wearer, the alms-food eater, the tree-root dweller, and the one who uses what is casually obtained.

original: phyag dar bzhin du bor ba'i phyir phyag dar dang 'dra ba'i gos ni phyag dar khrod do //
analyzed: phyag dar bzhin du bor ba'i phyir phyag dar dang 'dra ba'i gos ni phyag dar khrod do //
translated: The refuse-rag garment is a garment like a refuse-rag because it is discarded like a refuse-rag.

original: yang na phyag dar dag gi nang na 'dug pa'i gos phyag dar du bsags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang na phyag dar dag gi nang na 'dug pa'i gos phyag dar du bsags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Or, it is a garment that is collected as a refuse-rag among refuse-rags.

original: lhung bzed la sogs pa'i nang du zas bcug cing blugs pa ni bsod snyoms so //
analyzed: lhung bzed la sogs pa'i nang du zas bcug cing blugs pa ni bsod snyoms so //
translated: Alms-food is food that is put into the alms-bowl and so on.

original: shing ljon pa'i drung ni shing drung ngo //🔽tshags kyis btsags pa ni bkus te bor ba'o //
analyzed: shing ljon pa'i drung ni shing drung ngo //🔽tshags kyis btsags pa ni bkus te bor ba'o //
translated: The tree-root is the foot of a tree.🔽What is casually obtained is what is obtained by chance.

original: yang na bkus pa yang yin la bor ba yang yin pa ni bkus te bor ba'o //
analyzed: yang na bkus pa yang yin la bor ba yang yin pa ni bkus te bor ba'o //
translated: Or else, it is “cast off” because it is “cast off” by those who are “honorable. ”

original: bzhi po de dag ni tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi po de dag ni tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: These four are to be understood as the bases of pure conduct.

original: mkhyen zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i mkhyen pas so //
analyzed: mkhyen zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i mkhyen pas so //
translated: “Knows” means by mundane knowledge.

original: gzigs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mkhyen pas so //🔽phyag dar @254a * //
analyzed: gzigs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mkhyen pas so // phyag dar @254a * //
translated: “Sees” means by supramundane knowledge.

original: khrod ces bya ba ni phyag dar bzhin du bor phyag dar dang 'dra ba'i gos ni phyag dar khrod do //
analyzed: khrod ces bya ba ni phyag dar bzhin du bor phyag dar dang 'dra ba'i gos ni phyag dar khrod do //
translated: “Rag-robe” means “cast off like a rag. ”

original: yang na phyag dar dag gi nang na 'dug pa'i gos phyag dar du bsags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang na phyag dar dag gi nang na 'dug pa'i gos phyag dar du bsags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Or else, it is a cloth found among rags, that is, a cloth collected from a heap of rags.

original: rung ba zhes bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rung ba zhes bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Suitable” means free from offense.

original: rnyed kyang sla ste zhes bya ba ni brtsal ba chung dus rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnyed kyang sla ste zhes bya ba ni brtsal ba chung dus rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Easy to obtain” means obtained with little effort.🔽“Fine” means a cloth made from the silk worm.

original: dar zhes bya ba ni dar gyi srin bu las byung ba'i bye brag yug khyim ring ba'o //
analyzed: dar zhes bya ba ni dar gyi srin bu las byung ba'i bye brag yug khyim ring ba'o //
translated: “Long” means a cloth that is long.

original: ras yug chen zhes bya ba ni ras bal las byas pa khru bcu gnyis kyi tshad do //
analyzed: ras yug chen zhes bya ba ni ras bal las byas pa khru bcu gnyis kyi tshad do //
translated: A great cloth is a cloth made of cotton, twelve cubits long.

original: be'u ras zhes bya ba ni be'u ras spu can no //🔽dar la zhes bya ba ni dar srab mo rgyu spun sed bag can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: be'u ras zhes bya ba ni be'u ras spu can no // dar la zhes bya ba ni dar srab mo rgyu spun sed bag can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: A cloth of goat's hair is a cloth made of goat's hair.🔽A silk cloth is a thin cloth made of silk threads.

original: mon dar zhes bya ba ni dar gyi srin bu las byung ba'i rdzas so //
analyzed: mon dar zhes bya ba ni dar gyi srin bu las byung ba'i rdzas so //
translated: A cloth of wool is a cloth made from the wool of sheep.

original: be'u ras yug chen zhes bya ba ni ras kyi rnam pa spu can chen po'o //
analyzed: be'u ras yug chen zhes bya ba ni ras kyi rnam pa spu can chen po'o //
translated: A great cloth of goat's hair is a large cloth made of goat's hair.

original: be'u ras dmar po zhes bya ba ni be'u ras kyi rnam pa dmar po'o //
analyzed: be'u ras dmar po zhes bya ba ni be'u ras kyi rnam pa dmar po'o //
translated: A red cloth of goat's hair is a red cloth made of goat's hair.

original: be'u phrug ces bya ba ni ras kyi rnam pa spu can phra mo'o //
analyzed: be'u phrug ces bya ba ni ras kyi rnam pa spu can phra mo'o //
translated: A cloth of young goat's hair is a thin cloth made of young goat's hair.

original: la dmar zhes bya ba ni la ba'i rnam pa srin bu dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: la dmar zhes bya ba ni la ba'i rnam pa srin bu dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba'o //
translated: A red blanket is a blanket with the color of a red insect.

original: kha cig na re srin bu nag po'i mdog 'dra ba zhes kyang zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re srin bu nag po'i mdog 'dra ba zhes kyang zer ro //
translated: Some say it has the color of a black insect.

original: yul ka shi ka'i ras phran zhes bya ba ni yul ka shi dag tu btags pa'i ras shin tu phra zhing bzang ba'o //
analyzed: yul ka shi ka'i ras phran zhes bya ba ni yul ka shi dag tu btags pa'i ras shin tu phra zhing bzang ba'o //
translated: The cloth of Kasi is a very fine and excellent cloth made in the country of Kasi.

original: kha dog ran pa zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po dang dur smrig gsum gyi cha mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog ran pa zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po dang dur smrig gsum gyi cha mnyam pa'o //
translated: The proper color is a mixture of blue, yellow and red.

original: kha dog ngan pa zhes bya ba ni sngon po'am ser po'am dur smrig gcig tu kha bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: kha dog ngan pa zhes bya ba ni sngon po'am ser po'am dur smrig gcig tu kha bsgyur ba'o //
translated: The bad color is a cloth dyed only blue, yellow or red.

original: bal gos zhes bya ba ni bal las byas pa'o //🔽sha na'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i bye brag sha na phra mo'i ras so //
analyzed: bal gos zhes bya ba ni bal las byas pa'o // sha na'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i bye brag sha na phra mo'i ras so //
translated: The cloth of wool is made of wool.🔽The cloth of Shana is a cloth made of the fine grass called Shana.

original: zar ma'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i rnam ba zar ma zhes bya ba'i shun pa las byas pa'o //
analyzed: zar ma'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i rnam ba zar ma zhes bya ba'i shun pa las byas pa'o //
translated: The cloth of Shash. is made of the bark of the plant called Shash.

original: ras gos zhes bya ba ni ras bal las byas pa'o //
analyzed: ras gos zhes bya ba ni ras bal las byas pa'o //
translated: The cloth of cotton is made of cotton.

original: du gu la'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i rnam pa du gu la phra mo las byas pa'i ras phran no //
analyzed: du gu la'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i rnam pa du gu la phra mo las byas pa'i ras phran no //
translated: The cloth of Dugula is a fine cloth made of the grass called Dugula.

original: ko tam pa'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i rnam pa ko tam pa zhes bya ba phra mo las byas pa'i ras phran no //
analyzed: ko tam pa'i ras zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i rnam pa ko tam pa zhes bya ba phra mo las byas pa'i ras phran no //
translated: Cotton cloth is a small cloth made of cotton fibers called cotton.

original: kha cig na re rgyu ni ras bal las byas la /
analyzed: kha cig na re rgyu ni ras bal las byas la /
translated: Some say that the thread is made of cotton,

original: spun ni srin bal las byas pa'i ras phran ni ko tam pa'i ras zhes zer ro //
analyzed: spun ni srin bal las byas pa'i ras phran ni ko tam pa'i ras zhes zer ro //
translated: and the cloth is made of silk thread, and that cloth is called cotton cloth.

original: nyi 'og gos zhes bya ba ni rgya yul la sogs pa nas 'ongs pa'i gos so //
analyzed: nyi 'og gos zhes bya ba ni rgya yul la sogs pa nas 'ongs pa'i gos so //
translated: Foreign cloth is cloth that comes from China and other countries.

original: tshod zin par gyis @254b shig ces bya ba ni blang ba'i tshod shes par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: tshod zin par gyis @254b shig ces bya ba ni blang ba'i tshod shes par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Be moderate means know the proper amount to take.

original: dam 'cha' 'am zhes bya ba ni khas len tam zhes bya ba'o //🔽bsod snyoms zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed la sogs pa'i nang du zas bcug cing blugs pa'o //
analyzed: dam 'cha' 'am zhes bya ba ni khas len tam zhes bya ba'o // bsod snyoms zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed la sogs pa'i nang du zas bcug cing blugs pa'o //
translated: Do you agree? means Do you accept?🔽Alms means food placed in a begging bowl and so on.

original: 'bras chan zhes bya ba ni 'bras btsos pa la sogs pa'i zas so//
analyzed: 'bras chan zhes bya ba ni 'bras btsos pa la sogs pa'i zas so//
translated: Cooked food means food such as cooked rice and so on.

original: skyom zhes bya ba ni phye dang / chu dang / zhun mar dang / bal po se'u la sogs pa las byas pa'am 'o ma la sogs pa las byas pa'o //
analyzed: skyom zhes bya ba ni phye dang / chu dang / zhun mar dang / bal po se'u la sogs pa las byas pa'am 'o ma la sogs pa las byas pa'o //
translated: “Thin gruel” means made from flour, water, oil, or pomegranate, etc., or made from milk, etc.

original: thug pa zhes bya ba ni 'o ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i btung ba'o //
analyzed: thug pa zhes bya ba ni 'o ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i btung ba'o //
translated: “Thick gruel” means a drink made from milk, etc.

original: lnga ston zhes bya ba ni zhag lnga zhing sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: lnga ston zhes bya ba ni zhag lnga zhing sbyor ba'o //
translated: “Every five days” means to apply it every five days.

original: brgyang ston zhes bya ba ni tshes brgyad la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: brgyang ston zhes bya ba ni tshes brgyad la sbyor ba'o //
translated: “Every eight days” means to apply it on the eighth day.

original: bcu bzhi ston zhes bya ba ni chos bcu bzhi la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi ston zhes bya ba ni chos bcu bzhi la sbyor ba'o //
translated: “Every fourteen days” means to apply it on the fourteenth day.

original: nya ston zhes bya ba ni tshes bco lnga la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: nya ston zhes bya ba ni tshes bco lnga la sbyor ba'o //
translated: “Every month” means to apply it on the fifteenth day.

original: rtag res 'khor zhes bya ba ni dus rtag tu sbyor ba'i zas so //
analyzed: rtag res 'khor zhes bya ba ni dus rtag tu sbyor ba'i zas so //
translated: “Regular” means food that is applied at all times.

original: mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni lan 'ga' lan 'ga' 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni lan 'ga' lan 'ga' 'byung ba'o //
translated: “Invited” means to be invited again and again.

original: 'phral la bos pa zhes bya ba ni glo bur du bos pa'o //
analyzed: 'phral la bos pa zhes bya ba ni glo bur du bos pa'o //
translated: “Suddenly invited” means to be invited suddenly.

original: spags pa zhes bya ba ni phog pa'o //
analyzed: spags pa zhes bya ba ni phog pa'o //
translated: “Offered” means to be given.

original: gnas mal zhes bya ba ni 'dir nyal bas mal sa ste khri la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas mal zhes bya ba ni 'dir nyal bas mal sa ste khri la sogs pa'o //
translated: The term bed refers to a bed, a seat, etc., because one lies down on them.

original: 'dir 'dug pas stan te khri'u la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'dug pas stan te khri'u la sogs pa'o //
translated: The term seat refers to a seat, etc., because one sits on them.

original: shing drung zhes bya ba ni shing ljon pa'i drung ngo //
analyzed: shing drung zhes bya ba ni shing ljon pa'i drung ngo //
translated: The term under a tree refers to the foot of a tree.

original: khang pa zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi khyad par chung du'o ;🔽/ lnga khang zhes bya ba ni 'khor gyi khyams so //
analyzed: khang pa zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi khyad par chung du'o ; / lnga khang zhes bya ba ni 'khor gyi khyams so //
translated: The term in a sheltered place refers to a small dwelling.🔽 The term in a multi-storied building refers to a pavilion.

original: khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba ni ka bas mtshon pa shing yon po bcug pa'i khyams so //
analyzed: khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba ni ka bas mtshon pa shing yon po bcug pa'i khyams so //
translated: The term in a watchtower refers to a pavilion with pillars.

original: bsil khang zhes bya ba ni bdun brtsegs la sogs pa gang du dag sbyor tsha bas gdungs pa dag 'khod na bsil bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsil khang zhes bya ba ni bdun brtsegs la sogs pa gang du dag sbyor tsha bas gdungs pa dag 'khod na bsil bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The term in a cave refers to a place where one can be sheltered from the heat.

original: sab mos bskor ba zhes bya ba ni kho ra khor yug tu sab mos bskor ba'o //
analyzed: sab mos bskor ba zhes bya ba ni kho ra khor yug tu sab mos bskor ba'o //
translated: The term in a straw-built hut refers to a place surrounded by straw walls.

original: ba gam zhes bya ba ni gtsang khang phyur bu'i rnam pa ltar byas pa'o //
analyzed: ba gam zhes bya ba ni gtsang khang phyur bu'i rnam pa ltar byas pa'o //
translated: The term in a barn refers to a place built like a storied building.🔽 The term in the open air refers to a place without a roof.

original: khang bzangs zhes bya ba ni kho ra khor yug tu 'khor sa'i srang gis bskor ba'i khang bzangs so //
analyzed: khang bzangs zhes bya ba ni kho ra khor yug tu 'khor sa'i srang gis bskor ba'i khang bzangs so //
translated: A mansion is a house surrounded by a courtyard.

original: sgo khang steng gi bsil khang zhes bya ba ni sgo khang gi steng du gnas kyi bye brag gnyis brtsegs sam sum brtsegs pa'o //
analyzed: sgo khang steng gi bsil khang zhes bya ba ni sgo khang gi steng du gnas kyi bye brag gnyis brtsegs sam sum brtsegs pa'o //
translated: A pavilion is a two-storied or three-storied building on top of a gate.

original: khang steng gi yol khang zhes bya ba ni khang thog tu shing yon po yol bas g-yogs pa'o //🔽yol khang zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi rnam pa sbrang skyabs 'dra ba shing dag la kho ra khor yug tu yol bas g-yogs @255a * //
analyzed: khang steng gi yol khang zhes bya ba ni khang thog tu shing yon po yol bas g-yogs pa'o // yol khang zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi rnam pa sbrang skyabs 'dra ba shing dag la kho ra khor yug tu yol bas g-yogs @255a * //
translated: A shed is a building on top of a house, with a sloping roof supported by poles.🔽A tent is a dwelling surrounded by a curtain of cloth.

original: pa'o // spang leb khang zhes bya ba ni shing gi spang leb las byas pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: pa'o // spang leb khang zhes bya ba ni shing gi spang leb las byas pa'i gnas so //
translated: A hut is a dwelling made of wooden planks.

original: sa phug ces bya ba ni ched du byas pa'o //
analyzed: sa phug ces bya ba ni ched du byas pa'o //
translated: A cave is a dwelling made in the ground.

original: brag phug dang ri phug ces bya ba ni ched du ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: brag phug dang ri phug ces bya ba ni ched du ma byas pa'o //
translated: A crevice and a cave are dwellings not made by humans.

original: rtsva'i spyil bu zhes bya ba ni rtsva las byas pa'i spyil bu'o //
analyzed: rtsva'i spyil bu zhes bya ba ni rtsva las byas pa'i spyil bu'o //
translated: A hut of grass is a dwelling made of grass.

original: lo ma'i spyil bu zhes bya ba ni shing lo la sogs pa las byas pa'i spyil bu'o //
analyzed: lo ma'i spyil bu zhes bya ba ni shing lo la sogs pa las byas pa'i spyil bu'o //
translated: A leaf hut is a hut made of leaves and so on.

original: 'chag sar byas pa zhes bya ba ni ma'i las kyis bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: 'chag sar byas pa zhes bya ba ni ma'i las kyis bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: A walking place is one that is prepared by the work of a nun.

original: 'chag sar ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis brtsal ba la mi rton par 'chags pa'i tshe na rang grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'chag sar ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis brtsal ba la mi rton par 'chags pa'i tshe na rang grub pa'o //
translated: A non-walking place is one that is not prepared by the work of a nun, but is established by herself when she goes for a walk without relying on others.

original: bya skyibs su byas pa zhes bya ba ni ri las bang rim 'dra bar phyir byung ba mi'i las kyis bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: bya skyibs su byas pa zhes bya ba ni ri las bang rim 'dra bar phyir byung ba mi'i las kyis bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: A ledge is one that is prepared by the work of a human, protruding from a mountain like a step.

original: bya skyibs su ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni ri las bang rim 'dra bar phyir byung ba gzhan gyis brtsal ba la mi ltos par 'chags pa'i tshe na rang grub pa'o //
analyzed: bya skyibs su ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni ri las bang rim 'dra bar phyir byung ba gzhan gyis brtsal ba la mi ltos par 'chags pa'i tshe na rang grub pa'o //
translated: A non-ledge is one that is not prepared by the work of a human, but is established by herself when she goes for a walk without relying on others, protruding from a mountain like a step.

original: bkus te bor ba zhes bya ba ni tshags kyis btsags te bor ba'o //
analyzed: bkus te bor ba zhes bya ba ni tshags kyis btsags te bor ba'o //
translated: A discarded place is one that is discarded by a sieve.
